de.piratenpartei.id.vote

Class PublishedAccounts

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.piratenpartei.id.vote.PublishedAccounts

  • public class PublishedAccounts
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the list of published accounts. Currently this list is loaded statically. This should be changed in the future.
    Author:
    arne

    • Constructor Detail

      • PublishedAccounts

        private PublishedAccounts()
                   throws IllegalFormatException,
                          java.io.IOException
        Loads list of published accounts from a file (possibly fetched from the internet). The file has to have entries of the form:
        Hash:
        Modulus:
        Exponent:
        Hash:
        Modulus:
        Exponent:
        Extra lines are not allowed
        Throws:
        IllegalFormatException
        java.io.IOException
